Package business.entities.character.adventurer

Class Champion

java.lang.Object
business.entities.character.Character

business.entities.character.adventurer.Warrior
business.entities.character.adventurer.Champion
public class Champion extends Warrior
Class that represents a Champion, extends from Warrior.

  • Constructor Details

    • Champion

      public Champion(Character that)
      Constructs a new Champion object based on the provided Character object.
      Parameters:
      that - the Character object to base the Champion on.

  • Method Details

    • canEvolve

      public boolean canEvolve()
      Checks if the Champion character can evolve.
      Overrides:
      canEvolve in class Warrior
      Returns:
      true if the Champion character's level is less than CHAMPION_MIN_LEVEL, false otherwise.

    • evolve

      public Character evolve()
      Evolves the Champion if the level does not match the required level.
      Overrides:
      evolve in class Warrior
      Returns:
      a new Character object representing the evolved form of the Champion character.

    • setUpHpForAdventure

      public void setUpHpForAdventure()
      Sets up the maximum HP (hit points) for the Champion character before an adventure. The maximum HP is calculated based on the Champion's level, base HP, and body attribute.
      Overrides:
      setUpHpForAdventure in class Character

    • doPreparationAction

      public int doPreparationAction(Dice ignored)
      Performs the preparation action of the Champion character. The preparation action of the Champion increases a specific stat value.
      Overrides:
      doPreparationAction in class Adventurer
      Parameters:
      ignored - a Dice object representing the dice to be ignored (not used in this implementation).
      Returns:
      the value of the preparation stat.

    • isSelfPreparationAction

      public boolean isSelfPreparationAction()
      Checks if the preparation action of the Champion character is performed on self.
      Overrides:
      isSelfPreparationAction in class Adventurer
      Returns:
      false, as the preparation action is not performed on self.

    • doShortRestAction

      public int doShortRestAction(Dice ignored)
      Performs the short rest action of the Champion character. The short rest action of the Champion increases the current HP (hit points) to its maximum HP.
      Overrides:
      doShortRestAction in class Adventurer
      Parameters:
      ignored - a Dice object representing the dice to be ignored (not used in this implementation).
      Returns:
      the amount of HP healed during the short rest action.

    • getPreparationAction

      public String getPreparationAction()
      Retrieves the name of the preparation action of the Champion character.
      Overrides:
      getPreparationAction in class Adventurer
      Returns:
      the name of the preparation action.

    • getPreparationEffect

      public String getPreparationEffect()
      Retrieves the effect description of the preparation action of the Champion character.
      Overrides:
      getPreparationEffect in class Adventurer
      Returns:
      the effect description of the preparation action.
